long_description: Get speedy road performance without breaking the bank with the Scott Contessa Speedster 45 women's road bike, which boasts an aero aluminum frame, carbon fork and 24 gears. Double-butted 6061 aluminum frame boasts aerodynamic tube shaping for sleek, responsive performance. Carbon fork with alloy steer tube reduces weight and dampens energy-draining road vibrations. Shimano triple crankset is paired with a 11-28 cassette for gear combinations to handle every ride, from long climbs to fast descents and everything between. Shimano derailleurs and shifters deliver dependable, responsive shifting through the 24 gears. Alex Race 28 Aero Profile rims are wrapped with Schwalbe Lugano tires to provide smooth-rolling performance. Specs on the Scott Contessa Speedster 45 women's bike are subject to change.
short_description: Get speedy road performance without breaking the bank with the Scott Contessa Speedster 45 women's road bike, which boasts an aero aluminum frame, carbon fork and 24 gears.
